content.title: Nirman Shramikon Ke Bacchon Hetu Nishulk Ganvesh Evam Pustak Copy Hetu Sahaayata Raashi Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Nirman Shramikon Ke Bacchon Hetu Nishulk Ganvesh Evam Pustak Copy Hetu Sahaayata Raashi Yojana' for Construction Workers on 09 December 2022. The main objective of the scheme to provide financial assistance for the purpose of providing educational aids like uniforms and stationery.
eligibility: Applicant must be a registered construction worker under the Chhattisgarh Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board.
Applicant's children must be studying in classes 1 to 12 in any recognized school in Chhattisgarh.
documents_required: Certificate of children of workers studying in school.
Age certificate of children of construction workers.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Nirman Shramikon Ke Bacchon Hetu Nishulk Ganvesh Evam Pustak Copy Hetu Sahaayata Raashi Yojana' for construction worker on 09 December 2022.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to provide financial assistance for the purpose of providing educational aids like uniforms and stationery.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: The proposed assistance amount for school uniform and book copy will be payable in lump sum manner.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All registered construction worker individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: What is the required education eligibility to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant's children must be studying in classes 1 to 12 in any recognized school in Chhattisgarh.

What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board'. Only then applicant can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board'. Provide the required details. Fill out the application form. Submit.
